title: Business Development and Capture Analyst
content:
Harmonia Holdings Group, LLC is an award-winning minority and female owned federal government contractor committed to providing innovative, high-performing solutions to our government clients and focused on fostering a workplace that encourages growth, initiative, creativity, and employee satisfaction.  Harmonia Holdings Group, LLC, an award-winning federal government contractor, is seeking an Business Development and Capture Analyst for a growth opportunity providing a suite of services promoting and/or developing the effective use of technology by establishing and maintaining enterprise-wide solutions. The Business Development and Capture Analyst will support the entire BD and Capture life-cycle, with a focus on analysis, analytics, writing, and presentations through the gate review cycle.
 Required Qualifications:

Identify pursuits (pull from TM, eBuy, GovWin, etc.)
Conduct opportunity analysis, developing assessments based on:

Solicitation Size, Scope, and Complexity
Alignment to core competencies
Past Performances and Corporate Experience based on solicitation needs and program goals
Development of initial Probability of Win (PWIN) and Probably of Go (PGO) analysis


Lead and/or participate in coordinating development of RFI responses
Document and maintain Salesforce records
 

Minimum Qualifications:

Produce “forecast calendars” for resources as timing of solicitations become clearer. Coordinate with teams to ensure availability of Solution Architects, Proposal Manager, Technical Writers, Pricers, Graphics Artists, etc.
Prioritize capture efforts based on complex set of criteria, with ability to identify and justify recommendations
Coordinate initial Solution Architecture meetings with technical SMEs.
Develop business intelligence on incumbents
Propose Teaming Partners
Produce Gap Analyses
Update PWIN/PGO analysis
In collaboration with Harmonia’s Joint Venture partners, take active role in coordinating BD/Capture activities with business partners.
Maintain Salesforce records

Desired Experience:

Knowledge of Shipley Business Development model
Experience with Salesforce CRM tool
Intermediate to advanced Microsoft Office skills, especially Excel and Word
Strong analytical skills
Experience with proposal writing, including technical and management sections
Able to multi-task and handle multiple, parallel assignments
Excellent verbal and presentation skills
Prefer candidates with at least 5 years of BD and/or Capture experience.

Prefer candidates with knowledge and experience supporting the Department of Treasury and/or Department of Commerce. Experience at Securities and Exchange Commission and Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is also helpful.
 As per the Executive Order on Ensuring Adequate Covid Safety Protocols for Federal Contractors and regulations as detailed by www.saferfederalworkforce.gov , it is recommended that all federal government contractors be vaccinated against Covid-19, unless approved for an exemption/ accommodation on the basis of a sincerely held religious belief or medical circumstance.
